snippet.title: Mars Attracts - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760580/Mars_Attracts
Want to see how the game is made? Watch the devlog: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MHrrr3HuIm8&list=PL1TbyjF7QEAB8N1LkIcR6xkYcd_sXUrvY&index=2

Guess who's Ack, Ack again... Mars Attracts is a theme park management game set in the iconic universe of Mars Attacks™ .

Build rides, hire and train staff, manage guest needs, and most importantly - abduct humans to serve as the star attractions! Craft the perfect park to appeal to your Martian guests, but don’t forget to keep your humans’ needs met too - the hideous enclosed-brained Earthlings can be prone to escape!

Mars Attracts will be released in Early Access on Steam in 2025.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760580/Mars_Attracts
Web: http://www.MarsAttracts.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/tDUXRWEswh
Facebook, X, Insta, Tiktok: @OutlierSocial
